content.rendered:
Partner with Huemor.

We actively partner with media agencies, digital marketing companies, content studios, PR firms, venture capitalists, and software companies to deliver top-notch digital strategy, UI/UX, and full-stack development for their clients.

Trusted By

Why should you form a strategic partnership with us?

We’re proven.

We’ve been delivering highly recognized work for almost 10 years. If you need it done right the first time, we’re the team to make it happen.

No egos.

We’re here to be a team player and help your clients however we can. We’re open to both referral agreements or white label services.

We’re responsive.

We limit the number of clients we take on each year to ensure each one has an outstanding customer experience. Expect responses in hours – not days.

Commissions.

If our partners refer work to us we cut them a commission check. Who doesn’t love passive income?

Are we a match?

What services do you offer?

A full list of our service offerings can be found here.

 

In summary, our agency is focused on:

  • Digital Strategy
  • Site Architecture
  • UI/UX Design
  • Full-stack Development
  • Custom Theme Development
  • On-site/Technical SEO
  • Content Creation (Writing, Illustrations, Icons etc.)
What platforms do you work with?

We specialize in building digital experiences on WordPress and Shopify.

What does your team configuration look like?

We have two unique lines of business that are structured slightly differently.

 

Build

  • 1 Project Manager
  • 1 Creative Director
  • 1 Designer
  • 1 Full-stack Developer
  • 1 QA
  • 1 Content Manager
  • 1 Copywriter

 

Grow

  • 1 Project Manager
  • 1 Digital Strategist
  • 1 Full-stack Developer
  • 1 QA
How would a white label agreement work?

When agencies choose to white label us, the biggest hurdle to overcome is communication.

What we suggest is creating an alternate e-mail for the project manager assigned to your account so they can maintain seamless communication with your client.

Project deliverables and organization would be maintained using our preferred PM set-up (Asana) and a group Slack channel would be formed to handle smaller collaboration between our teams.

What do you charge?

Our typical build project is $50,000-$100,000.

Our typical grow agreement starts at $5,000/month.

How much commission can I receive?

Commissions are only distributed for referral work. If you choose to white label our agency, you won’t be entitled to a commission. Commissions are also only awarded if we win the business referred to us.

 

Exact commissions are negotiated on a per-partnership basis, after that point, the commissions are locked in for the lifetime of the partnership.

 

Commissions typically vary from 5-15%.

Partnership Application.

To begin you application, please fill out the form to your right. Please note that we will not be able to accept or respond to all applications submitted through this form.
